mapper.select: select num_id from CL_PRODUCT order by NUM_ID desc limit 1 ;

select t1.*, t2.NUM_DISCOUNT_NUMBER
from nnt_user_coupons t1 LEFT JOIN nnt_platform_coupon t2 on t1.NUM_PLATFORM_COUPON_ID = t2.NUM_ID where t1.NUM_STATE = 1 and t1.NUM_USER_ID = #{vcUserId}

select t1.NUM_ID numId, t1.VC_HIGHT vcHight, t1.VC_WIGHT vcWight, t1.VC_NAME vcName, t1.VC_PHONE vcPhone, t1.NUM_TYPE numType, t1.NUM_NUM numNum, t1.NUM_STATE numState, t1.DAT_CREAT_TIME datCreatTime, t1.DAT_UPDATE_TIME datUpdateTime, t1.NUM_PRICE numPrice, t1.VC_USER_ID vcUserId, t1.VC_OPEN_ID vcOpenId, t1.DAT_CONFIRM_TIME datConfirmTime, t1.VC_NOTES vcNotes, t1.NUM_SCHOOL_ID numSchoolId, t1.NUM_GRADE_ID numGradeId, t1.NUM_MODEL_ID numModelId, t1.VC_ORDER_NO vcOrderNo, t1.VC_UNION_ID vcUnionId, t1.VC_SIGN_DESC vcSignDesc, t1.NUM_PAR_TYPE numParType, t1.NUM_PAY_STATE numPayState, t1.NUM_PAY_TYPE numPayType, t3.VC_EXPIRE_TIME , t5.NUM_DISCOUNT_NUMBER, t6.NUM_AMOUNT , t7.VC_SCHOOL_NAME , t8.VC_GRADE_NAME, t9.VC_MODEL_NAME from (SELECT * from CL_PRODUCT where vc_order_no = #{vcOrderNo}) t1 LEFT JOIN payment_order_record t2 on t1.vc_order_no = t2.VC_ORDER_NO left JOIN payment_flow t3 on t2.NUM_PAY_FLOW_ID = t3.num_id left JOIN nnt_user_coupons t4 on t2.NUM_USER_COUPON_ID = t4.NUM_ID left JOIN nnt_platform_coupon t5 on t4.NUM_PLATFORM_COUPON_ID = t5.NUM_ID LEFT JOIN nnt_user_balance_change_recode t6 on t2.NUM_USER_MONEY_LOG_ID = t6.NUM_ID LEFT JOIN CL_FN_SCHOOL t7 on t1.NUM_SCHOOL_ID = t7.NUM_ID LEFT JOIN CL_FN_GRADE t8 on t1.NUM_GRADE_ID = t8.NUM_ID LEFT JOIN CL_FN_MODEL t9 on t1.NUM_MODEL_ID =t9.NUM_ID
